section.name: Configuring Synapse for Script Mediator Support
section.p: The Synapse Script Mediator is a Synapse extension, and thus all prerequisites are not bundled by default with the Synapse distribution.Before you use some script mediators you may need to manually add the required jar files to the Synapse lib directory, and optionally perform other installation tasks as may be required by the individual scripting language. This is explained in the following sections.

subsection.name: JavaScript Support
subsection.p: The JavaScript/E4X support is enabled by default and comes ready-to-use with the Synapse distribution.

subsection.name: Ruby Support
subsection.p:
For Ruby support you need to download the 'jruby-complete.jar' from the Maven repository for JRuby, and copy it into the 'lib' folder of Synapse . The JRuby JAR can be downloaded from
here

subsection.name: JSON Support
